nodes.text: Relaali was the traditional capital of the planet 244Core.

Located in the central sector of Zone One, Reelali was the traditional capital of 244Core, and was named after Relaali, the negotiator who first brokered peace between the corporations and formed the Corporate Committee and the position of Chief Administrator.

A large city surrounded by industrial mining facilities, company-owned living quarters, three major ground and speeder transportation hubs, and the most sophisticated spaceport on the planet, Reelali was home to the local offices of every major corporation on the planet. Over the centuries, Zone One and Reelali proper had been struck by meteorites, with the impact craters being visible in the city's layout. Because of these regular impacts, the planet's administrative center was located deep under the city, and was the hub of corporate politics on the planet.
